lines:
1986

21 Apri2, 1916.

Mr. S. S. Kwan

kon ogonery St.

Boston, bass.

My dear Xwan:

Many thanks for your taster greetings. I 
appreciate deeply your thoughtfalness in remembering

me at this tine.

when are you coming up to see ne? I shall

count on an early interview in order that we may talk

over in detail plans for your coming conference at

Aadovox.

with bot wishes as always, believa

raithfully yours,
raw: 1986 21 Apri2, 1916. Mr. S. S. Kwan kon ogonery St. Boston, bass. My dear Xwan: Many thanks for your taster greetings. I appreciate deeply your thoughtfalness in remembering me at this tine. when are you coming up to see ne? I shall count on an early interview in order that we may talk over in detail plans for your coming conference at Aadovox. with bot wishes as always, believa raithfully yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter with Easter greetings and asking when they might meet to discuss detailed plans for his conference at Andover.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
